intro.p: As AI tools like ChatGPT become more common in education, a national survey asked U.S. adults whether they support teaching students how to use AI responsibly as part of high school curriculum. A total of {{s}} adults responded to the survey. Of those, {{x}} adults agreed with incorpating AI literacy into high schools.

Compute a {{CL}}\% confidence interval for the proportion of {{prose}}. You may use an app to do the computations. You must show all your computations and/or a screenshot of any app used. Please use your work answer the following.

content.p: What is p-hat? Please give your answer exact to three decimal places.
What is the standard error for this interval? Please give your answer exact to four decimal places.
What is the confidence interval? Please give your answer in proper interval format exact to four decimal places.
Put the resulting interval into context to answer the following question: What percentage of U.S. adults support teaching AI literacy into high schools?

outtro.p: With {{CL}}\% confidence level, the percentage of U.S. adults that support teaching AI literacy in high schools is between {{LB_p}}\% and {{UB_p}}\%.
